title: Golf: Rolling Ball
instructions:
A golf ball is sitting on the course. Your job is to roll it into the hole!

You have one function:
- `move_ball_to(x)` moves the ball to position `x`

The ball starts at position **28** and needs to reach position **88**. You'll need to track the ball's position in a variable and update it in a loop.

Your solution should use a variable to track `x` and a repeat loop to move the ball one step at a time.
hints: Start by setting a variable x to 28
Use a repeat loop that runs 60 times
Inside the loop, increase x by 1, then call move_ball_to(x)
The ball needs to end up at position 88
